sentences.en: But in the morass of all this minutiae, we seem to be missing the point.
sentences.cn: 但在一切细节的沼泽中, 我们似乎漏掉了一点.

sentences.en: EXAMPLE : During the rainy season the valley became an impassible morass.
sentences.cn: 雨季的山谷变成了不可通行的沼泽.

sentences.en: Human Performance Enhancement: ü berhumans or Ethical Morass?
sentences.cn: 人体机能强化: 造就超人还是造就道德困境?

sentences.en: I tried to drag myself out of the morass of despair.
sentences.cn: 我试图从绝望的困境中走出来。

sentences.en: In order to morass area , it's the best choice for middling enterprise to founding their name - brand.
sentences.cn: 对中小企业来说,走品牌发展之路是摆脱各种困境的极佳选择.

sentences.en: Lothar destroys three outposts in the Black Morass.
sentences.cn: 洛萨在黑色沼泽摧毁了三个岗哨.

sentences.en: Men with confidence can strive and boldly march in a morass of difficulty.
sentences.cn: 自信的人即使身处困境,也会自强不息,奋勇向前!

sentences.en: Organized abandonment gives them a way out of the morass.
sentences.cn: 有组织的放弃给他们指明了离开这片沼泽的出路.

sentences.en: The books are written off as a morass of stuff and nonsense.
sentences.cn: 这些书写的全是一派胡言.

sentences.en: The Orcs are pushed back to the brink of the Dark Portal on the Black Morass.
sentences.cn: 兽人被击退到黑色沼泽的黑暗之门外围.

sentences.en: We’re trying to drag the country out of its economic morass.
sentences.cn: 我们在尽力使国家摆脱经济困境。

sentences.en: With so many people to please, the result is often a mediocre morass of compromises.
sentences.cn: 众口难调, 结果常常是平庸的折中主义纠集一处.

trans.tran_cn: 缠作一团，困境，<文>沼泽，陷阱
trans.tran_en: a dangerous area of soft wet ground
